turkish_example_sentence: Biz onların gerçek niyetlerini bilmezsek, asla güvenemeyiz.
english_example_sentence: If we don't know their true intentions, we can never trust them.
russian_example_sentence: Если мы не будем знать их истинные намерения, мы никогда не сможем им доверять.
